De La Démocratie en Amérique (French pronunciation: [dəla demɔkʁasi ɑ̃n‿ameˈʁik]; bipụtara na mpịakọta abụọ, nke mbụ na afo 1835 na nke abụọ na afo 1840) bụ ederede French nke Alexis de Tocqueville dere. Aha ya na-asụgharị n'ụzọ nkịtị ka On Democracy na Amerika, mana nsụgharị Bekee ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na'ozuzu ha bụ Democracy na  Amerika
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, onye odee akwukwo ahu bù Tocqueville na-enyocha mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke o kwenyere na ọ na'ime ọtụtụ narị afọ gara aga.
